name: Clunky Space game
description:
Explore your smallness in space, as a small space ship, or more specifically a small man inside of that space ship rushing around to frantically activate and deactivate thrusters.

'Clunky space game' is an input experiment made for a 1 game 1 week rapid prototyping game with the weeks theme of 'weird input'. this is purely an expiment on a movement system. I was aiming for something like "lovers in a dangerous space time" and "Regular Human Basket Ball".

Let me know your thoughts.
